FuncDef: This command configures a port down priority control event that monitors the operational state of a port or SONET/SDH channel. When the port or channel enters the operational down state, the event is considered set. When the port or channel enters the operational up state, the event is considered cleared.

ParaDef.Info: The port ID of the port monitored by the VRRP priority control event. Values-The following values apply to the 7750 SR:.

ExtraInfo: Default: no port-down - No port down priority control events are defined.
